name: Lollipop Hell
description:
Game made for the Trijam #152 Game jam.
The game took around 4 hours to make, sadly couldn't keep it under 3!

You are a lollipop and there are plenty of annoying insects interested in your sweetness!

Reach the goal alone (without any insects attached) and after you've collected 5 sugar cubes!

You can use either keyboard/mouse or gamepad.

Controls:

Space/A: Jump (you can only jump while the stick of the lollipop is touching the ground)

Ctrl/Left mouse/Y: Shake (removes the insects attached to the lollipop. You can only do it once after each sugar cube collected)
